greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Lexicographic ordering of NxNxN, where N={1,2,3,...}.
example: Flatten the list of ordered lattice points, (1,1,1) < (1,1,2) < (1,2,1) < ..., to 1,1,1, 1,1,2, 1,2,1, ...
xref: A186003: distances to the plane x=0
A186004: distances to the plane y=0
A186005: distances to the plane z=0
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Sep 07 2000
